trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Moultrie
There was one other sighting in Moultrie on or around August 9th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy ask if we could out side to see if spot ufo's right way as soon as we. we spoted one in the west 2nd 3 in triangle form was in the west from us. my wife came outside she seen the 1st moveing 2nd sighting 3 in a triangle. 3rd sighting was to the south of us. ALL 3 sighting were above 85.000 ft
Summary: 1st onemove from west toeast 2nd sighting their were 3 ufos that form a triangle 3rd sighting was sitting still
